enum.name: ButtonName
enum.description: Defines the hard (physical) and soft (touchscreen) buttons available from SYNC

element.name: BUTTONUP
element.description: A button has been released up

element.name: BUTTONDOWN
element.description: A button has been pressed down

element.name: LONG
element.description: A button was released, after it was pressed for a long time. Actual timing is defined by head unit and may vary

element.name: SHORT
element.description: A button was released, after it was pressed for a short time. Actual timing is defined by head unit and may vary

enum.name: SoftButtonType
enum.description: Contains information about the SoftButton capabilities.

enum.name: SystemAction
enum.description: Enumeration that describes system actions that can be triggered.

element.name: DEFAULT_ACTION
element.description: Default action occurs. Standard behavior (e.g. SoftButton clears overlay).

element.name: STEAL_FOCUS
element.description: The calling app's dialog or related event should clear and the app should be brought into HMI_FULL.

element.name: KEEP_CONTEXT
element.description: Current system context is maintained. An overlay is persisted even though a SoftButton has been pressed and the notification sent.

enum.name: AppHMIType
enum.description: Enumeration listing possible app types.

enum.name: LayoutMode
enum.description: For touchscreen interactions, the mode of how the choices are presented.
This mode causes the interaction to display the previous set of choices as icons.
This mode causes the interaction to display the previous set of choices as icons along with a search field in the HMI.
This mode causes the interaction to display the previous set of choices as a list.
This mode causes the interaction to display the previous set of choices as a list along with a search field in the HMI.
This mode causes the interaction to immediately display a keyboard entry through the HMI.

enum.name: DeactivateReason
enum.description: Specifies the functionality the User has switched to.

element.name: GENERAL
element.description: Other screens navigation apart from other mobile app.

enum.name: ClockUpdateMode
enum.description: Describes how the media clock timer should behave on the platform
Starts the media clock timer counting upwards, as in time elapsed.
Starts the media clock timer counting downwards, as in time remaining.
Pauses the media clock timer
Resume the media clock timer
Clears the media clock timer (previously done through Show->mediaClock)

enum.name: SystemContext
enum.description: Enumeration that describes possible contexts the application might be in on HU.
Communicated to whichever app is in HMI FULL, except Alert.

element.name: MAIN
element.description: The app's persistent display (whether media/non-media/navigation) is fully visible onscreen.
There is currently no user interaction (user-initiated or app-initiated) with the head-unit

element.name: VRSESSION
element.description: The system is currently in a VR session (with whatever dedicated VR screen being overlaid onscreen).

element.name: MENU
element.description: The system is currently displaying a system or in-App menu onscreen.

element.name: HMI_OBSCURED
element.description: The app's display HMI is currently obscuring with either a system or other app's overlay (except of Alert element).

element.name: ALERT
element.description: Broadcast only to whichever app has an alert currently being displayed.

enum.name: HmiZoneCapabilities
enum.description: Contains information about the HMI zone capabilities.
For future use.

enum.name: SpeechCapabilities
enum.description: Contains information about the TTS capabilities.

enum.name: VrCapabilities
enum.description: Contains information about the VR capabilities.

enum.name: TBTState
enum.description: Enumeration that describes possible states of turn-by-turn client or SmartDeviceLink app.

enum.name: ApplicationsCloseReason
enum.description: Describes the reasons for exiting all of applications.

enum.name: DisplayType
enum.description: The possible types of HU display.

enum.name: ImageType
enum.description: Contains information about the type of image.

element.name: mainField1
element.description: The first line of first set of main fields of the persistent display; applies to "Show"

element.name: mainField2
element.description: The second line of first set of main fields of the persistent display; applies to "Show"

element.name: mainField3
element.description: The first line of second set of main fields of persistent display; applies to "Show"

element.name: mainField4
element.description: The second line of second set of main fields of the persistent display; applies to "Show"

element.name: statusBar
element.description: The status bar on NGN; applies to "Show"

element.name: mediaClock
element.description: Text value for MediaClock field; applies to "Show"

element.name: mediaTrack
element.description: The track field of NGN and GEN1.1 MFD displays. This field is only available for media applications; applies to "Show"

element.name: alertText1
element.description: The first line of the alert text field; applies to "Alert"

element.name: alertText2
element.description: The second line of the alert text field; applies to "Alert"

element.name: alertText3
element.description: The third line of the alert text field; applies to "Alert"

element.name: scrollableMessageBody
element.description: Long form body of text that can include newlines and tabs; applies to "ScrollableMessage"

element.name: initialInteractionText
element.description: First line suggestion for a user response (in the case of VR enabled interaction

element.name: ETA
element.description: Estimated Time of Arrival time for navigation

element.name: totalDistance
element.description: Total distance to destination for navigation

element.name: audioPassThruDisplayText1
element.description: First line of text for audio pass thru

element.name: audioPassThruDisplayText2
element.description: Second line of text for audio pass thru

element.name: choiceImage
element.description: The first image field for Choice

element.name: choiceSecondaryImage
element.description: The secondary image field for Choice

element.name: menuIcon
element.description: The image field for the menu icon in SetGlobalProperties

element.name: showConstantTBTIcon
element.description: The primary image field for ShowConstantTBT

element.name: showConstantTBTNextTurnIcon
element.description: The secondary image field for ShowConstantTBT

enum.name: TextAlignment
enum.description: The list of possible alignments, left, right, or centered

enum.name: DriverDistractionState
enum.description: Enumeration that describes possible states of driver distraction.

element.name: CLOCK1
element.description: minutesFieldWidth = 2;minutesFieldMax = 19;secondsFieldWidth = 2;secondsFieldMax = 99;maxHours = 19;maxMinutes = 59;maxSeconds = 59; Is used for Type II, NGN and CID head units.

element.name: CLOCK2
element.description: minutesFieldWidth = 3;minutesFieldMax = 199;secondsFieldWidth = 2;secondsFieldMax = 99;maxHours = 59;maxMinutes = 59;maxSeconds = 59; Is used for Type V head units.

element.name: CLOCK3
element.description: minutesFieldWidth = 2;minutesFieldMax = 59;secondsFieldWidth = 2;secondsFieldMax = 59;maxHours = 9;maxMinutes = 59;maxSeconds = 59; Is used for GEN1.1 (i.e. MFD3/4/5) head units.

element.name: CLOCKTEXT1
element.description: 5 characters possible Format: 1|sp c :|sp c c 1|sp : digit "1" or space c : character out of following character set: sp|0-9|[letters :|sp : colon or space Is used for Type II head unit

element.name: CLOCKTEXT2
element.description: 5 chars possible Format: 1|sp c :|sp c c 1|sp : digit "1" or space c : character out of following character set: sp|0-9|[letters :|sp : colon or space Is used for CID and NGN head unit

element.name: CLOCKTEXT3
element.description: 6 chars possible Format: 1|sp c c :|sp c c 1|sp : digit "1" or space c : character out of following character set: sp|0-9|[letters :|sp : colon or space Is used for Type V head unit

element.name: CLOCKTEXT4
element.description: 6 chars possible Format: c :|sp c c : c c :|sp : colon or space c : character out of following character set: sp|0-9|[letters]. Is used for GEN1.1 (i.e. MFD3/4/5) head units

enum.name: ComponentVolumeStatus
enum.description: The volume status of a vehicle component.

element.name: ALERT
element.description: The component`s volume is in critical level.

enum.name: PRNDL
enum.description: The selected gear.

enum.name: VehicleDataEventStatus
enum.description: Reflects the status of a vehicle data event; e.g. a seat belt event status.

element.name: NO_EVENT
element.description: The system does not have the adequate information to send valid YES or NO states.

element.name: NO
element.description: The requested event is in NO state.

element.name: YES
element.description: The requested event is in YES state.

element.name: NOT_SUPPORTED
element.description: The requested data is not supported

enum.name: VehicleDataStatus
enum.description: Reflects the status of a binary vehicle data item.

enum.name: IgnitionStableStatus
enum.description: Reflects the ignition switch stability.

element.name: MISSING_FROM_TRANSMITTER
element.description: Either the data is not accessible or the sensor is broken.

enum.name: IgnitionStatus
enum.description: Reflects the status of ignition.

element.name: ACCESSORY
element.description: The accessories are active (power windows, audio, display, etc.).

element.name: INVALID
element.description: The data is provided, but there is some sort of fault or problem.

enum.name: DeviceLevelStatus
enum.description: Reflects the reported component status of the connected device, if reported.

enum.name: PrimaryAudioSource
enum.description: Reflects the current primary audio source (if selected).

enum.name: CompassDirection
enum.description: The list of potential compass directions

enum.name: Dimension
enum.description: The supported dimensions of the GPS

enum.name: WarningLightStatus
enum.description: Reflects the status of a cluster instrument warning light.

enum.name: VehicleDataResultCode
enum.description: Enumeration that describes possible result codes of a vehicle data entry request.

enum.name: VehicleDataType
enum.description: Defines the data types that can be published and subscribed to.

enum.name: WiperStatus
enum.description: Reflects the status of the wipers.

element.name: OFF_MOVING
element.description: Means that though set to off, somehow the wipers have been engaged (physically moved enough to engage a wiping motion).

element.name: MAN_INT_OFF
element.description: The wipers are manually off after having been working.

element.name: MAN_LOW
element.description: The wipers are manually set to low speed.

element.name: MAN_HIGH
element.description: The wipers are manually set to high speed.

element.name: MAN_FLICK
element.description: The wipers are manually set for doing a flick.

element.name: WASH
element.description: The wipers are set to use the water from vehicle washer bottle for cleaning the windscreen.

element.name: AUTO_LOW
element.description: The wipers are automatically set to low speed.

element.name: AUTO_HIGH
element.description: The wipers are automatically set to high speed.

element.name: COURTESYWIPE
element.description: This is for when a user has just initiated a WASH and several seconds later a secondary wipe is automatically initiated to clear remaining fluid.

element.name: AUTO_ADJUST
element.description: This is set as the user moves between possible automatic wiper speeds.

element.name: STALLED
element.description: The wiper is stalled to its place.

element.name: NO_DATA_EXISTS
element.description: The sensor / module cannot provide any information for wiper.

enum.name: SamplingRate
enum.description: Describes different sampling options for PerformAudioPassThru.

enum.name: BitsPerSample
enum.description: Describes different quality options for PerformAudioPassThru.

enum.name: AudioType
enum.description: Describes different audio type options for PerformAudioPassThru.

enum.name: KeyboardLayout
enum.description: Enumeration listing possible keyboard layouts.

enum.name: KeyboardEvent
enum.description: Enumeration listing possible keyboard events.

enum.name: KeypressMode
enum.description: Enumeration listing possible keyboard events.

element.name: SINGLE_KEYPRESS
element.description: Each keypress is individually sent as the user presses the keyboard keys.

element.name: QUEUE_KEYPRESSES
element.description: The keypresses are queued and a string is eventually sent once the user chooses to submit their entry.

element.name: RESEND_CURRENT_ENTRY
element.description: The keypresses are queue and a string is sent each time the user presses a keyboard key; the string contains the entire current entry.

enum.name: AmbientLightStatus
enum.description: Reflects the status of the ambient light sensor.

enum.name: FileType
enum.description: Enumeration listing possible file types.

enum.name: RequestType
enum.description: Enumeration listing possible asynchronous requests.

enum.name: ECallConfirmationStatus
enum.description: Reflects the status of the eCall Notification.

enum.name: VehicleDataNotificationStatus
enum.description: Reflects the status of a vehicle data notification.

enum.name: EmergencyEventType
enum.description: Reflects the emergency event status of the vehicle.

enum.name: FuelCutoffStatus
enum.description: Reflects the status of the RCM fuel cutoff.

enum.name: PowerModeQualificationStatus
enum.description: Reflects the status of the current power mode qualification.

enum.name: CarModeStatus
enum.description: Reflects the status of the current car mode.

enum.name: PowerModeStatus
enum.description: Reflects the status of the current power mode.

struct.name: ButtonCapabilities
struct.description: Contains the information about capabilities of a button.

param.name: name
param.description: The name of the Button from the ButtonName enum

param.name: shortPressAvailable
param.description: The button supports a short press. Whenever the button is pressed short, onButtonPressed(SHORT) should be invoked.

param.name: longPressAvailable
param.description: The button supports a LONG press. Whenever the button is pressed long, onButtonPressed(LONG) should be invoked.

param.name: upDownAvailable
param.description: The button supports "button down" and "button up". Whenever the button is pressed, onButtonEvent(DOWN) should be invoked. Whenever the button is released, onButtonEvent(UP) should be invoked.

param.name: dataType
param.description: Defined published data element type.

param.name: resultCode
param.description: Published data result code.

param.name: x
param.description: The x coordinate of the touch.

param.name: y
param.description: The y coordinate of the touch.

param.name: id
param.description: A touch's unique identifier. The application can track the current touch events by id. If a touch event has type begin, the id should be added to the set of touches. If a touch event has type end, the id should be removed from the set of touches.

param.name: ts
param.description: The time that the touch was recorded. This number can the time since the beginning of the session or something else as long as the units are in milliseconds. The timestamp is used to determined the rate of change of position of a touch. The application also uses the time to verify whether two touches, with different ids, are part of a single action by the user. If there is only a single timestamp in this array, it is the same for every coordinate in the coordinates array.

struct.name: PresetBankCapabilities
struct.description: Contains information about on-screen preset capabilities (whether the HW preset buttons could be duplicated with onscreen buttons).

param.name: onScreenPresetsAvailable
param.description: Must be true if onscreen custom presets are available.

param.name: value
param.description: The path to the dynamic image stored on HU or the static binary image itself.

param.name: imageType
param.description: Describes, whether it is a static or dynamic image.

param.name: type
param.description: Describes, whether text, icon or both text and image should be displayed on the soft button. See softButtonType

param.name: text
param.description: Optional text to be displayed (if defined as TEXT or BOTH)

param.name: image
param.description: Optional image struct for SoftButton (if defined as IMAGE or BOTH)

param.name: isHighlighted
param.description: If true, must be highlighted
If false, must be not

param.name: softButtonID
param.description: Value which must be returned via OnButtonPress / OnButtonEvent

param.name: systemAction
param.description: Parameter indicates whether clicking a SoftButton must call a specific system action. See SystemAction

struct.name: TTSChunk
struct.description: A TTS chunk, that consists of the text/phonemes to be spoken

param.name: text
param.description: The text or phonemes to be spoken.

param.name: type
param.description: Describes, whether it is text or a specific phoneme set. See SpeechCapabilities.

struct.name: HMIApplication
struct.description: Data type containing information about application needed by HMI.

param.name: appName
param.description: The mobile application name, e.g. "Ford Drive Green".

param.name: ngnMediaScreenAppName
param.description: Provides an abbreviated version of the app name (if needed), that may be displayed on the NGN media screen.
If not provided, the appName should be used instead (and may be truncated if too long)

param.name: icon
param.description: Path to application icon stored on HU.

param.name: deviceName
param.description: The name of device which the provided application is running on.

param.name: appID
param.description: Unique (during ignition cycle) id of the application. To be used in all RPCs sent by both HU system and SDL

param.name: hmiDisplayLanguageDesired
param.description: The language the application intends to use on HU

param.name: isMediaApplication
param.description: Indicates whether it is a media or a non-media application.

param.name: appType
param.description: List of all applicable app types stating which classifications to be given to the app.
e.g. for platforms like GEN2, this determines which "corner(s)" the app can populate.

param.name: parentID
param.description: unique ID of the sub menu, the command must be added to.
If not provided, the command must be added to the top level of the in application menu.

param.name: position
param.description: Position within the items that are at the top level of the in application menu.
0 should insert at the front.
1 should insert at the second position.
if position is greater than or equal to the number of items on the top level, the the sub menu/command should be appended to the end.
If this param is omitted the entry should be added at the end.

param.name: menuName
param.description: The name of the sub menu/command.

struct.name: Choice
struct.description: A choice is an option given to the user which can be selected either by menu, or through voice recognition system.

param.name: choiceID
param.description: The unique within the concerned application identifier for this choice

param.name: menuName
param.description: The name of the choice

param.name: image
param.description: The image for representing the choice

param.name: secondaryText
param.description: Optional secondary text to display; e.g. address of POI in a search result entry

param.name: tertiaryText
param.description: Optional tertiary text to display; e.g. distance to POI for a search result entry

param.name: secondaryImage
param.description: Optional secondary image struct for choice

param.name: text
param.description: Text to display for VR Help item

param.name: image
param.description: Image struct for VR Help item

param.name: position
param.description: Position to display item in VR Help list

param.name: hours
param.description: The hour of the media clock.
Some units only support a max of 19 hours. If out of range, it should be rejected.

param.name: resolutionWidth
param.description: The image resolution width.

param.name: resolutionHeight
param.description: The image resolution height.

param.name: resolution
param.description: The resolution of the prescribed screen area.

param.name: touchEventAvailable
param.description: Types of screen touch events available in screen area.

param.name: name
param.description: The name that identifies the field. See ImageFieldName.

param.name: imageTypeSupported
param.description: The image types that are supported in this field. See FileType.

param.name: imageResolution
param.description: The image resolution of this field.

struct.name: DisplayCapabilities
struct.description: Contains information about the display capabilities.

param.name: displayType
param.description: The type of the display. See DisplayType

param.name: textFields
param.description: A set of all fields for text displaying supported by HU. See TextFieldName.
If there are no textfields supported, the empty array must be returned

param.name: imageFields
param.description: A set of all fields that support images. See ImageField

param.name: mediaClockFormats
param.description: A set of all supported formats of the media clock. See MediaClockFormat

param.name: graphicSupported
param.description: The display's persistent screen supports referencing a static or dynamic image.

struct.name: SoftButtonCapabilities
struct.description: Contains information about a SoftButton's capabilities.

param.name: shortPressAvailable
param.description: The button supports a short press.
Whenever the button is pressed short, onButtonPressed( SHORT) must be invoked.

param.name: longPressAvailable
param.description: The button supports a LONG press.
Whenever the button is pressed long, onButtonPressed( LONG) must be invoked.

param.name: upDownAvailable
param.description: The button supports "button down" and "button up".
Whenever the button is pressed, onButtonEvent( DOWN) must be invoked.
Whenever the button is released, onButtonEvent( UP) must be invoked.

param.name: imageSupported
param.description: Must be true if the button supports referencing a static or dynamic image.

struct.name: AudioPassThruCapabilities
struct.description: Describes different audio type configurations for PerformAudioPassThru. e.g. 8kHz,8-bit,PCM

param.name: fieldName
param.description: The name of the field for displaying the text.

param.name: fieldText
param.description: The text itself.

param.name: language
param.description: The keyboard language.

param.name: keyboardLayout
param.description: Desired keyboard layout.

param.name: sendDynamicEntry
param.description: In this mode, all keypresses will be sent as they occur.
If disabled, entire string of text will be returned only once submitted by user.
If omitted, this value will be set to FALSE.

param.name: keypressMode
param.description: Desired keypress mode. If omitted, this value will be set to RESEND_CURRENT_ENTRY.

param.name: limitedCharacterList
param.description: Array of keyboard characters to enable.
All omitted characters will be greyed out (disabled) on the keyboard.
If omitted, the entire keyboard will be enabled.

param.name: autoCompleteText
param.description: Allows an app to prepopulate the text field with a suggested or completed entry as the user types

param.name: navigationText
param.description: Uses navigationText from TextFieldStruct.

param.name: make

e.g. Ford

param.description: Model of the vehicle
e.g. Fiesta

param.name: modelYear

param.name: trim

param.description: References signal "RCM_FuelCutoff". See FuelCutoffStatus.

param.name: rolloverEvent
param.description: References signal "VedsEvntRoll_D_Ltchd". See VehicleDataEventStatus.

param.name: maximumChangeVelocity
param.description: References signal "VedsMaxDeltaV_D_Ltchd". See VehicleDataEventStatus.

param.name: multipleEvents
param.description: References signal "VedsMultiEvnt_D_Ltchd". See VehicleDataEventStatus.

param.name: powerModeActive
param.description: References signal "PowerMode_UB".

param.name: powerModeQualificationStatus
param.description: References signal "PowerModeQF". See PowerModeQualificationStatus.

param.name: carModeStatus
param.description: References signal "CarMode". See CarMode.

param.name: powerModeStatus
param.description: References signal "PowerMode". See PowerMode.

param.name: e911Override
param.description: Indicates whether e911 override is on. See VehicleDataStatus.

function.name: GetCapabilities
function.description: Method is invoked at system start-up. SDL requests the information about all supported hardware buttons and their capabilities

param.name: capabilities
param.description: Response must provide the names of available buttons and their capabilities.See ButtonCapabilities

param.name: presetBankCapabilities
param.description: Must be returned if the platform supports custom on-screen Presets

function.name: OnButtonEvent
function.description: HU system must notify about every UP/DOWN event for buttons

param.name: mode
param.description: Indicates whether this is an UP or DOWN event.

param.name: customButtonID
param.description: Must be provided if ButtonName is CUSTOM_BUTTON, this references the integer ID passed by a custom button. (e.g. softButtonName)

param.name: mode
param.description: Indicates whether this is a LONG or SHORT button press event.

param.name: customButtonID
param.description: Must be returned if ButtonName is CUSTOM_BUTTON, this references the string passed by a custom button. (e.g. softButtonName)

function.name: OnReady
function.description: HMI must notify SDL about its readiness to start communication. In fact, this has to be the first message between SDL and HMI.

function.name: OnStartDeviceDiscovery
function.description: Initiated by HMI user for getting the list of connected devices.

function.name: UpdateDeviceList
function.description: Request from SmartDeviceLink to HMI to change device list.

param.name: deviceList
param.description: The array of names/IDs of connected devices

function.name: OnUpdateDeviceList
function.description: Notification from HMI to SDL sent when HMI requires update of device list (i.e. when user clicks 'Change Device' button)

function.name: AllowDeviceToConnect
function.description: Request from SmartDeviceLink to HMI to get the permissions of new device connection.

function.name: OnDeviceChosen
function.description: Notification must be initiated by HMI on user selecting device in the list of devices.

param.name: deviceInfo
param.description: The name and ID of the device chosen

function.name: OnFindApplications
function.description: This method must be invoked by HMI to get list of registered apps.

param.name: deviceInfo
param.description: The name and ID of the device the list of registered applications is required for.

function.name: UpdateAppList
function.description: Issued by SDL to notify HMI about new applications registered.

function.name: ActivateApp
function.description: Request from SDL to HMI to bring specified application to front on UI e.g make it HMI status 'FULL'.

param.name: appID
param.description: ID of deactivated application.

function.name: OnAppActivated
function.description: Must be sent by HU system when the user clicks on app in the list of registered apps or on soft button with 'STEAL_FOCUS' action.

param.name: appID
param.description: ID of selected application.

function.name: OnAppDeactivated
function.description: Must be sent by HU system when the user switches to any functionality which is not other mobile application.

param.name: appID
param.description: ID of deactivated application.

param.name: reason
param.description: Specifies the functionality the user has switched to.

function.name: OnAppRegistered
function.description: Issued by SDL to notify HMI about new application registered.

param.name: application
param.description: The information about application registered. See HMIApplication.

param.name: resume
param.description: Flag to indicate if application may be resumed in future

function.name: OnAppUnregistered
function.description: Issued by SDL to notify HMI about application unregistered. Application then to be removed from application list; all data connected with application has to be cleared up.

param.name: appID
param.description: ID of the application unregistered

param.name: resume
param.description: Flag to indicate if application may be resumed in future

function.name: GetResumeResult
function.description: Issued by SDL to request HMI resumption check.

param.name: appID
param.description: ID of the registered application that will be resumed

function.name: GetResumeResult
function.description: Issued by HMI to notify SDL about application resumption check.

param.name: result
param.description: Flag to indicate if applications data check was successfull

function.name: OnExitApplication
function.description: Must be sent by HMI when the User chooses to exit the application..

param.name: appID
param.description: ID of the application to be exited.

function.name: OnExitAllApplications
function.description: Sent by HMI to SDL to close all registered applications.

param.name: reason
param.description: Specifies reason for exiting all apllications.

function.name: MixingAudioSupported
function.description: Request from SDL to HMI to find out if the last one supports mixing audio (i.e. recording TTS command and playing audio).

function.name: MixingAudioSupported
function.description: If no response received SDL supposes that mixing audio is not supported

param.name: attenuatedSupported
param.description: Must be true if supported

function.name: PlayTone
function.description: Sent by SDL to HMI to notify that the tone should be played.

function.name: AllowAllApps
function.description: Initiated by SDL. Results by user/HMI allowing SDL functionality or disallowing access to all mobile apps.

param.name: allowed
param.description: Must be true if allowed

function.name: AllowApp
function.description: Initiated by SDL for requesting the allowance for the application

param.name: app
param.description: Information about the application. See HMIApplication.

param.name: appPermissions
param.description: List of permissions required by application.

param.name: allowed
param.description: Must be true if allowed

function.name: OnSystemRequest
function.description: An asynchronous request from the system for specific data from the device or the cloud or response to a request from the device or cloud Binary data can be included in hybrid part of message for some requests (such as Authentication request responses)

param.name: requestType
param.description: The type of system request.

param.name: url
param.description: Optional array of URL(s) for HTTP requests.

param.name: fileType
param.description: Optional file type (meant for HTTP file requests).

param.name: offset
param.description: Optional offset in bytes for resuming partial data chunks

param.name: length
param.description: Optional length in bytes for resuming partial data chunks

function.name: IsReady
function.description: Method is invoked at system startup. Response provides information about presence of VR module and its readiness to cooperate with SDL.

param.name: available
param.description: Must be true if VR is present and ready to communicate with SDL.

function.name: Started
function.description: Must be initiated by VR module to let SDL know that VR session has started.

function.name: Stopped
function.description: Must be initiated by VR module to let SDL know that VR session has stopped.

function.name: AddCommand
function.description: Request from SDL to add a command(string with associated id) to VR.

param.name: cmdID
param.description: ID of a command (further to be used in OnCommand notification).

param.name: vrCommands
param.description: List of strings to be used as VR commands.

param.name: appID
param.description: ID of application that requested this RPC.

function.name: DeleteCommand
function.description: Request from SDL to delete a command from VR.

param.name: cmdID
param.description: Id of a command (list of strings), previously sent by AddCommand.

param.name: appID
param.description: ID of application that requested this RPC.

function.name: OnCommand
function.description: Notifies SDL about command trigerred via VR

param.name: cmdID
param.description: ID of of the command (list of strings)

param.name: appID
param.description: ID of application related to this RPC.

function.name: ChangeRegistration
function.description: Request from SmartDeviceLink to HMI to change language of VR.

param.name: language
param.description: The language application wants to switch to.

param.name: appID
param.description: ID of application that concerns this RPC.

function.name: OnLanguageChange
function.description: Notification from HMI to SmartDeviceLink about change of language.

param.name: language
param.description: Language VR has switched to.

function.name: GetSupportedLanguages
function.description: Method is invoked at system start-up. Response must provide the information about VR supported languages.

param.name: languages
param.description: List of languages supported in VR.

function.name: GetLanguage
function.description: Request from SmartDeviceLink to HMI to get currently active VR language

function.name: GetCapabilities
function.description: Method is invoked at system startup by SDL to request information about VR capabilities of HMI.

param.name: vrCapabilities
param.description: Types of input recognized by VR module.

interface.name: TTS
interface.description: RPCs for communication between TTS and SDL.

function.name: GetCapabilities
function.description: Method is invoked at system start-up. SDL requests the information about all supported hardware and their capabilities

function.name: Started
function.description: Must be initiated by TTS module to let SDL know that TTS session has started.

function.name: Stopped
function.description: Must be initiated by TTS module to let SDL know that TTS session has stopped.

function.name: IsReady
function.description: Method is invoked at system start-up. Response must provide the information about presence of TTS module and its readiness to cooperate with SDL.

param.name: available
param.description: Must be true if TTS is present and ready to communicate with SDL.

function.name: PerformInteraction
function.description: Sets some properties for the application initiated request.

param.name: helpPrompt
param.description: The help prompt. An array of text chunks of type TTSChunk. See TTSChunk. The array must have at least one item.

param.name: initialPrompt
param.description: This is the intial prompt spoken to the user at the start of an interaction. An array of text chunks of type TTSChunk. See TTSChunk. The array must have at least one item.

param.name: timeoutPrompt
param.description: Help text for a wait timeout. An array of text chunks of type TTSChunk. See TTSChunk. The array must have at least one item.

param.name: timeout
param.description: Timeout initiate timeoutPrompt

function.name: Speak
function.description: RPC from SDL to TTS for speaking the text.

param.name: ttsChunks
param.description: List of strings to be spoken.

param.name: appID
param.description: ID of application that requested this RPC.

function.name: Speak
function.description: Provides information about success of operation.

function.name: StopSpeaking
function.description: Initiated by SDL to stop speaking the text.

function.name: ChangeRegistration
function.description: Request from SmartDeviceLink to HMI to change language of TTS.

param.name: language
param.description: The language application wants to switch to.

param.name: appID
param.description: ID of application related to this RPC.

function.name: OnLanguageChange
function.description: Notification from HMI to SmartDeviceLink about change of language.

param.name: language
param.description: Language TTS has switched to.

function.name: GetSupportedLanguages
function.description: Method is invoked at system start-up by SDL. Response must provide the information about TTS supported languages.

param.name: languages
param.description: List of languages supported in TTS.

function.name: GetLanguage
function.description: Request from SmartDeviceLink to HMI to get currently active TTS language

function.name: SetGlobalProperties
function.description: Sets some properties for the application initiated request.

param.name: helpPrompt
param.description: The help prompt. An array of text chunks of type TTSChunk. See TTSChunk. The array must have at least one item.

param.name: timeoutPrompt
param.description: Help text for a wait timeout. An array of text chunks of type TTSChunk. See TTSChunk. The array must have at least one item.

param.name: appID
param.description: ID of application related to this RPC.

function.name: Alert
function.description: Request from SDL to show an alert message on the display.

param.name: alertStrings
param.description: Array of lines of alert text fields. See TextFieldStruct. Uses alertText1, alertText2, alertText3.

param.name: duration
param.description: Timeout in milliseconds.

param.name: softButtons
param.description: App defined SoftButtons

param.name: progressIndicator
param.description: If supported on the given platform, the alert GUI will include some sort of animation indicating that loading of a feature is progressing. e.g. a spinning wheel or hourglass, etc.

param.name: appID
param.description: ID of application requested this RPC.

param.name: tryAgainTime
param.description: Amount of time (in milliseconds) that SDL must wait before resending an alert. Must be provided if another system event or overlay currently has a higher priority than this alert.

function.name: ShowNotification
function.description: Initiated by SDL in order to notify user about some actions, i.e. while waiting for updates from server etc.

param.name: timeout
param.description: Pop-up is expected to be shown before time specified with timeout is up and then closed by HMI or closed upon ClosePopUp request from SDL.

param.name: showStrings
param.description: Array of lines of show text fields. See TextFieldStruct. Uses mainField1, mainField2, mainField3, mainField4. If some field is not set, the corresponding text should stay unchanged. If field's text is empty "", the field must be cleared. mainField1: The text that should be displayed in a single or upper display line. mainField2: The text that should be displayed on the second display line. mainField3: The text that should be displayed on the second "page" first display line. mainField4: The text that should be displayed on the second "page" second display line. statusBar: statusBar. mediaClock: Text value for MediaClock field. mediaTrack: The text that should be displayed in the track field. This field is only valid for media applications on NGN type ACMs.

param.name: alignment
param.description: Specifies how mainField1 and mainField2 texts should be aligned on the display.
If omitted, texts must be centered

param.name: graphic
param.description: Path to optional dynamic image or the static binary image itself. See Image. If omitted, the displayed graphic should not change.

param.name: secondaryGraphic
param.description: Image struct determining whether static or dynamic secondary image to display in app. If omitted on supported displays, the displayed secondary graphic shall not change.

param.name: softButtons
param.description: App defined SoftButtons.
If omitted, the currently displayed SoftButton values should not change.

param.name: customPresets
param.description: App labeled on-screen presets (i.e. GEN3 media presets or dynamic search suggestions).
If omitted on supported displays, the presets will be shown as not defined.

param.name: appID
param.description: Id of application related to this RPC.

function.name: AddCommand
function.description: Request from SDL to add a command to the application menu.

param.name: cmdID
param.description: ID of the command to be added.

param.name: menuParams
param.description: Optional sub value containing parameters of the command (position, name, etc.). See MenuParams. If omitted the command should be added to the end of the list of commands.

param.name: cmdIcon
param.description: Image to be displayed for representing the command. See Image.
If omitted, no (or the default if applicable) icon should be displayed.

param.name: appID
param.description: ID of application that concerns this RPC.

function.name: DeleteCommand
function.description: Request from SDL to delete a command from the in-application menu with the specified command id.

param.name: cmdID
param.description: cmdId previously sent via AddCommand request - id of the command to be deleted.

param.name: appID
param.description: ID of application that concerns this RPC.

function.name: AddSubMenu
function.description: Request from SDL to add a sub menu to the in-application menu.

param.name: menuID
param.description: ID of the sub menu to be added. Unique for the application.

param.name: menuParams
param.description: Position and name of menu to be added. 'parent' field is omitted for this RPC.

param.name: appID
param.description: ID of application that requested this RPC.

function.name: DeleteSubMenu
function.description: Request from SDL to delete a submenu from the in-application menu.

param.name: menuID
param.description: The "menuID" of the sub-menu to be deleted. (See addSubMenu.menuID)

param.name: appID
param.description: ID of application that concerns this RPC.

function.name: PerformInteraction
function.description: Request from SDL for triggering an interaction (e.g. "Permit GPS?" - Yes, no, Always Allow).

param.name: initialText
param.description: Uses initialInteractionText. See TextFieldStruct.

param.name: choiceSet
param.description: The list of choices to be used for the interaction with the user

param.name: vrHelpTitle
param.description: VR Help Title text.
If omitted on supported displays, the default HU system help title should be used.

param.name: vrHelp
param.description: VR Help Items. If omitted on supported displays, the default HU system generated help items should be used.

param.name: timeout
param.description: Timeout in milliseconds.

param.name: interactionLayout
param.description: See LayoutMode.

param.name: appID
param.description: ID of application that concerns this RPC.

param.name: choiceID
param.description: ID of the choice that was selected in response to PerformInteraction.

param.name: manualTextEntry
param.description: Manually entered text selection, e.g. through keyboard Can be returned in lieu of choiceID, depending on trigger source

function.name: SetMediaClockTimer
function.description: Sets the initial media clock value and automatic update method.

param.name: startTime
param.description: startTime should be ignored for "PAUSE", "RESUME", and "CLEAR"

param.name: endTime
param.description: See TimeFormat. endTime can be provided for "COUNTUP" and "COUNTDOWN"; to be used to calculate any visual progress bar (if not provided, this feature is ignored) If endTime is greater then startTime for COUNTDOWN or less than startTime for COUNTUP, then the request will return an INVALID_DATA. endTime will be ignored for "PAUSE", "RESUME", and "CLEAR"

param.name: updateMode
param.description: The update method of the media clock.
In case of pause, resume, or clear, the start time value is ignored and shall be left out. For resume, the time continues with the same value as it was when paused.

param.name: appID
param.description: ID of application that requested this RPC.

function.name: SetGlobalProperties
function.description: Request from SDL to set some properties for VR help.

param.name: vrHelpTitle
param.description: VR Help Title text.
If omitted on supported displays, the default HU system help title should be used.

param.name: vrHelp
param.description: VR Help Items. If omitted on supported displays, the default HU system generated help items should be used.

param.name: menuTitle
param.description: Optional text to label an app menu button (for certain touchscreen platforms).

param.name: menuIcon
param.description: >Optional icon to draw on an app menu button (for certain touchscreen platforms).

param.name: keyboardProperties
param.description: On-screen keybaord configuration (if available).

param.name: appID
param.description: ID of application that concerns this RPC.

function.name: OnCommand
function.description: Notification must be initiated by HMI on user choosing menu item.

param.name: cmdID
param.description: Command ID, which is related to a specific menu entry (previously sent with AddCommand).

param.name: appID
param.description: ID of application that is related to this RPC.

function.name: OnSystemContext
function.description: Notification must be initiated by HMI when the user changes the context of application: goes to menu (in-application menu or system menu); switches to VR; pop-up appears on screen etc.

param.name: systemContext
param.description: The context the application is brought into.

function.name: GetCapabilities
function.description: Method is invoked at system startup by SDL to request information about UI capabilities of HMI.

param.name: displayCapabilities
param.description: Information about the capabilities of the display: its type, text field supported, etc. See DisplayCapabilities.

param.name: softButtonCapabilities
param.description: Must be returned if the platform supports on-screen SoftButtons.

function.name: ChangeRegistration
function.description: Request from SmartDeviceLink to HMI to change language for app.

param.name: language
param.description: The language application wants to switch to.

param.name: appID
param.description: ID of application that concerns this RPC.

function.name: OnLanguageChange
function.description: Notification from HMI to SmartDeviceLink about change of language.

param.name: language
param.description: Language UI has switched to.

function.name: GetSupportedLanguages
function.description: Method should be invoked at system startup. Response provides information about UI supported languages.

param.name: languages
param.description: List of languages supported in UI.

function.name: GetLanguage
function.description: Request from SmartDeviceLink to HMI to get currently active UI language

function.name: OnDriverDistraction
function.description: Notification must be sent from HMI to SDL when driver distraction state is changed. Driver distraction rules are defined by the platform.

param.name: state
param.description: See DriverDistractionState.

function.name: SetAppIcon
function.description: Used to set existing local file on SYNC as the app's icon.

param.name: syncFileName
param.description: Either the path to the dynamic image stored on HY or the static binary image itself. See Image

param.name: appID
param.description: ID of application related to this RPC.

function.name: ShowCustomForm
function.description: Used to show a custom form; it can be a parent or child screen. If no parent screen is designated, it is set as a parent screen.

param.name: customFormID
param.description: Predefined or dynamically created screen layout. Currently only predefined forms are defined. Predefined layouts include: "DEFAULT" - Default media / non-media screen "ONSCREEN_PRESETS" - Custom root media screen containing app-defined onscreen presets. "KEYBOARD_SEARCH" - Custom template containing app-configured on-screen keyboard with active search updating; user also can trigger voice search. "NAV_FULLSCREEN_MAP" - Custom root template screen containing full screen map with navigation controls. "NAV_POI_MENU" - Custom template containing app-defined POI options. "NAV_SEARCH_RESULTS" - Custom template containing a list of app-defined search results "NAV_POI_INFO" - Custom template containing app-defined POI information (and potentially map data).

param.name: parentFormID
param.description: Parent screen of predefined form to display. Currently only predefined forms are defined. If not provided, then set to "DEFAULT". Predefined layouts include: "DEFAULT" - Default media / non-media screen "ONSCREEN_PRESETS" - Custom root media screen containing app-defined onscreen presets. "NAV_FULLSCREEN_MAP" - Custom template containing full screen map with navigation controls.

param.name: info
param.description: Provides additional human readable info regarding the result.

function.name: ShowKeyboard
function.description: Configures and populates on-screen keyboard.

param.name: language
param.description: The keyboard language.

param.name: keyboardLayout
param.description: Desired keyboard layout.

param.name: sendDynamicEntry
param.description: In this mode, all keypresses will be sent as they occur.
If disabled, entire string of text will be returned only once submitted by user.
If omitted, this value will be set to FALSE.

param.name: limitedCharacterList
param.description: Array of keyboard characters to enable.
All omitted characters will be greyed out (disabled) on the keyboard.
If omitted, the entire keyboard will be enabled.

param.name: autoCompleteText
param.description: Allows an app to prepopulate the text field with a suggested or completed entry as the user types

param.name: info
param.description: Provides additional human readable info regarding the result.

function.name: OnKeyboardInput
function.description: On-screen keyboard event.
Can be full string or individual keypresses depending on keyboard mode.

param.name: event
param.description: On-screen keyboard input data.

param.name: data
param.description: On-screen keyboard input data.
For dynamic keypress events, this will be the current compounded string of entry text.
For entry submission events, this will be the full text entry (this will always return regardless of the mode).
For entry cancelled and entry aborted events, this data param will be omitted.

function.name: OnTouchEvent
function.description: Notifies about touch events on the screen's prescribed area

param.name: type
param.description: The type of touch event.

param.name: event
param.description: List of all individual touches involved in this event.

function.name: Slider
function.description: Creates a full screen or pop-up overlay (depending on platform) with a single user controlled slider.

param.name: numTicks
param.description: Number of selectable items on a horizontal axis

param.name: position
param.description: Initial position of slider control (cannot exceed numTicks)

param.name: sliderHeader
param.description: Text header to be displayed.

param.name: sliderFooter
param.description: Text footer to be displayed (meant to display min/max threshold descriptors).
For a static text footer, only one footer string shall be provided in the array.
For a dynamic text footer, the number of footer text string in the array must match the numTicks value.
For a dynamic text footer, text array string should correlate with potential slider position index.
If omitted on supported displays, no footer text shall be displayed.

param.name: timeout
param.description: Timeout. The slider should be displayed until the defined amount of time has elapsed.

param.name: appID
param.description: ID of application that concerns this RPC.

param.name: sliderPosition
param.description: Current slider position. Must be returned when the user has clicked the ‘Save’ or ‘Canceled’ button or by the timeout

function.name: ScrollableMessage
function.description: Creates a full screen overlay containing a large block of formatted text that can be scrolled with up to 8 SoftButtons defined

param.name: messageText
param.description: Body of text that can include newlines and tabs. Uses scrollableMessageBody.

param.name: timeout
param.description: Timeout in milliseconds. The message should be displayed until the time defined is up.

param.name: softButtons
param.description: App defined SoftButtons.
If omitted on supported displays, only the system defined "Close" SoftButton should be displayed.

param.name: appID
param.description: ID of application related to this RPC.

param.name: audioPassThruDisplayTexts
param.description: Uses audioPassThruDisplayText1: First line of text displayed during audio capture. audioPassThruDisplayText2: Second line of text displayed during audio capture.

param.name: maxDuration
param.description: The maximum duration of audio recording in milliseconds. If not provided, the recording should be performed until EndAudioPassThru arrives.

param.name: appID
param.description: ID of application related to this RPC.

function.name: EndAudioPassThru
function.description: Request is sent by SDL to stop the audio capturing.

function.name: IsReady
function.description: Method is invoked at system startup. Response provides information about presence of UI module and its readiness to cooperate with SDL.

param.name: available
param.description: Must be true if UI is present and ready to communicate with SDL.

function.name: ClosePopUp
function.description: Initiated by SDL to close currently active pop-up on HMI.

param.name: methodName
param.description: Method to be closed

function.name: ClosePopUp
function.description: Provides the result of operation.

function.name: OnResetTimeout
function.description: HMI must provide SDL with notifications specific to the current Turn-By-Turn client status on the module

param.name: appID
param.description: Id of application that invoked notifcation.

param.name: methodName
param.description: Currently used method name on which was triggered action

function.name: IsReady
function.description: Method is invoked at system startup. Response must provide the information about presence of UI Navigation module and its readiness to cooperate with SDL.

param.name: available
param.description: Must be true if Navigation is present and ready to communicate with SDL.

function.name: ShowConstantTBT
function.description: Request from SmartDeviceLinkCore to HMI to show info about navigation.

param.name: navigationTexts
param.description: See TextFieldStruct. Uses: navigationText1 navigationText2 ETA totalDistance.

param.name: distanceToManeuver
param.description: Fraction of distance till next maneuver (from previous maneuver).
May be used to calculate progress bar.

param.name: distanceToManeuverScale
param.description: Fraction of distance till next maneuver (starting from when AlertManeuver is triggered).
May be used to calculate progress bar.

param.name: maneuverComplete
param.description: If and when a maneuver has completed while an AlertManeuver is active, SDL will send this value set to TRUE in order to clear the AlertManeuver overlay.
If omitted the value should be assumed as FALSE.

param.name: softButtons
param.description: Three dynamic SoftButtons available
If omitted on supported displays, the currently displayed SoftButton values will not change.

param.name: appID
param.description: ID of application related to this RPC.

function.name: AlertManeuver
function.description: Request from SmartDeviceLinkCore to HMI to announce navigation maneuver

param.name: softButtons
param.description: If omitted, only the system defined "Close" SoftButton should be displayed.

function.name: UpdateTurnList
function.description: Request from SmartDeviceLinkCore to HMI to update turn list.

param.name: softButtons
param.description: If omitted, app-defined SoftButton should be left blank.

param.name: appID
param.description: ID of application related to this RPC.

function.name: OnTBTClientState
function.description: HMI must provide SDL with notifications specific to the current Turn-By-Turn client status on the module

param.name: state
param.description: Current State of TBT client

function.name: IsReady
function.description: Method is invoked at system startup. Response should provide information about presence of any of vehicle information modules (ECU, GPS, etc) and their readiness to cooperate with SDL.

param.name: available
param.description: Must be true if vehicle data modules are present and ready to communicate with SDL.

function.name: GetVehicleType
function.description: Request from SmartDeviceLinkCore to HMI to get info about the vehicle (type, model, etc.).

function.name: ReadDID
function.description: Request from SDL for vehicle data reading.

param.name: ecuName
param.description: Name of ECU.

param.name: didLocation
param.description: Get raw data from vehicle data DID location(s).

param.name: appID
param.description: ID of application related to this RPC.

param.name: didResult
param.description: Array of requested DID results (with data if available).

function.name: GetDTCs
function.description: Vehicle module diagnostic trouble code request.

param.name: ecuName
param.description: Name of ECU.

param.name: dtcMask
param.description: DTC Mask Byte to be sent in diagnostic request to module .

param.name: appID
param.description: ID of application that requested this RPC.

param.name: ecuHeader
param.description: 2 byte ECU Header for DTC response (as defined in VHR_Layout_Specification_DTCs.pdf)

param.name: dtc
param.description: Array of all reported DTCs on module. Each DTC is represented with 4 bytes: 3 bytes for data 1 byte for status

function.name: SubscribeVehicleData
function.description: Subscribes for specific published data items. The data will be only sent if it has changed. The application will be notified by the onVehicleData notification whenever new data is available. To unsubscribe the notifications, use unsubscribe with the same subscriptionType.

param.name: gps
param.description: See GPSData

param.name: speed
param.description: The vehicle speed in kilometers per hour

param.name: rpm
param.description: The number of revolutions per minute of the engine

param.name: fuelLevel
param.description: The fuel level in the tank (percentage)

param.name: fuelLevel_State
param.description: The fuel level state

param.name: instantFuelConsumption
param.description: The instantaneous fuel consumption in microlitres

param.name: externalTemperature
param.description: The external temperature in degrees celsius

param.name: prndl
param.description: See PRNDL

param.name: tirePressure
param.description: See TireStatus

param.name: odometer
param.description: Odometer in km

param.name: beltStatus
param.description: The status of the seat belts

param.name: bodyInformation
param.description: The body information including power modes

param.name: deviceStatus
param.description: The device status including signal and battery strength

param.name: driverBraking
param.description: The status of the brake pedal

param.name: wiperStatus
param.description: The status of the wipers

param.name: headLampStatus
param.description: Status of the head lamps

param.name: engineTorque
param.description: Torque value for engine (in Nm) on non-diesel variants

param.name: accPedalPosition
param.description: Accelerator pedal position (percentage depressed)

param.name: steeringWheelAngle
param.description: Current angle of the steering wheel (in deg)

param.name: engineOilLife
param.description: The estimated percentage of remaining oil life of the engine.

param.name: eCallInfo
param.description: Emergency Call notification and confirmation data

param.name: airbagStatus
param.description: The status of the air bags

param.name: emergencyEvent
param.description: Information related to an emergency event (and if it occurred)

param.name: clusterModeStatus
param.description: The status modes of the cluster

param.name: myKey
param.description: Information related to the MyKey feature
